# restaurantLocation

**Instance Property**

The name and location of the restaurant.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var restaurantLocation: CLPlacemark { get }
```

## Getting the Restaurant Reservation Information

- **reservationDuration**: The date and time range that defines beginning and end of the restaurant reservation.
- **partySize**: The number of people in the party.
